recipesJson.name: Strawberry Cream Cookie
recipesJson.author: setkaos
recipesJson.description:
Sweet cookie with strawberry cream frosting. 
The INW Biscuit and CAP Sugar Cookie make up the main flavor profile. 
CAP Sweet Strawberry and TPA Strawberry Ripe for a sweet strawberry top note. 
FA Meringue and TPA Bavarian Cream to finish with a toasted, baked creamy flavor. 
Tastes great as a SNV but steep for 2 weeks for optimal flavor.
